duties_responsibilities.duty: Book journal entries for land developments in a timely manner
Maintain and close books for all entities in a timely manner
Produce monthly P&L and balance sheets for the Company and reconcile all accounts
Book monthly accruals/month-end journal entries for the Company
Process each closing for lot sales and home closings
Maintain the master vendor list and verify/add new vendors to the system
Book homebuilding vouchers/invoices when the accounts payable team is absent
Print checks/process ACH transfers when the accounts payable team is absent
Reconcile bank statements monthly for the Company
Report Arkansas Sales tax rebates monthly
Support the Director of Accounting to identify opportunities for improvement and implement new processes
